record.field: You cannot cancel the working shift "%(ws)s" because it is already invoiced.
You cannot cancel the working shift "%(ws)s" because some of its interventions are already invoiced
The product "%(product)s" used to invoice working shifts doesn\'t have Revenue Account.
The field "%(field)s" of Working Shift Intervention "%(intervention)s" is required because of the shift\'s contract.

You can\'t not assign the employee "%(employee)s" to the working shift "%(working_shift)s" because he is already assigned to the working shift "%(conflictive_working_shift)s" with the same time interval.
Start time can\'t be less of end time.
